Package com.scalar.dl.e2e.bfd

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    TestCase_Data_Auditor_AssetLockTampered
    This test case tests if ScalarDL can detect if Auditor's asset_lock has been tampered with.
    TestCase_Data_Auditor_AssetTampered
    This test case tests if ScalarDL can detect an asset has been tampered with.
    TestCase_Data_Auditor_ContractTampered
    This test case tests if ScalarDL can detect a registered contract has been altered.
    TestCase_Data_Auditor_IncorrectPrivateKey
    This test case tests if ScalarDL can detect the case where Auditor runs with an incorrect private key from the registerd certificate.
    TestCase_Data_Auditor_LedgerCertificateTampered
    This test case tests if ScalarDL can detect if Ledger's registered certificate on Auditor has been tamper with.
    TestCase_Data_Auditor_RequestProofDeleted
    This test case tests if ScalarDL can detect the case that the related request proofs are not found in the auditor.request_proof table.
    TestCase_Data_Client_AuditorDisabled
    This test case tests if ScalarDL can detect a case where a client doesn't enable the auditor mode.
    TestCase_Data_Client_IncorrectPrivateKey
    This test case tests if ScalarDL can detect the client uses incorrect private key.
    TestCase_Data_Ledger_AssetTampered
    This test case tests if ScalarDL can detect an asset has been tampered with.
    TestCase_Data_Ledger_AssetTempered_NonLinearizablyValidated
    This test case tests if ScalarDL can detect an asset has been tampered with.
    TestCase_Data_Ledger_AuditorCertificateTampered
    This test case tests if ScalarDL can detect if Auditor's registered certificate on Ledger has been tamper with.
    TestCase_Data_Ledger_ContractTampered
    This test case tests if ScalarDL can detect a registered contract in Ledger has been altered.
    TestCase_Data_Ledger_IncorrectPrivateKey
    This test case tests if ScalarDL can detect the case where Ledger runs with an incorrect private key from the registerd certificate.
    TestCase_Program_Ledger_BadContractExecuted
    This test case tests if ScalarDL can detect a case where a client doesn't enable the auditor mode.
